pages.text: $(l)Meaning:$() Peace and Cooperation $(br)$(l)Primary Aspect:$() $(9)Grace$()$(br)$(l)Obtaining:$() Obtain a malachite figurine of your own by trading with a Crystal Witch villager.

pages.title: Malachite Figurine
pages.text: $(o)A treasured symbol of cooperation and peace between villages$()
